about_the_game:
Ling Notes - Xiao Hei (Fan Wu-Jiu). DLC (with 29999 Ling coins attached) contains - Xiao Hei (Fan Wu-Jiu). Ling coins 29999 are attached to DLC.

Thousands of sails race against the cloudy waves and thousands of miles of wind rush down the wrasse.
_The uniform worn by the commander of the naval guard is the symbol of the highest rank of the naval division.
Dressed in scaly fur armour, with a brass Bracelet carved by a snake at the waist, and bare-armed, the men in the sand show their enthusiasm and unrestrained.
